com.jwetherell.motion_detection.detection

Class Comparer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jwetherell.motion_detection.detection.Comparer

  • public class Comparer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is adapted from the web site below. It is used to compare two State objects. http://mindmeat.blogspot.com/2008/11/java-image-comparison.html
    Author:
    Pat Cullen, Justin Wetherell

    • Method Detail

      • isDifferent

        public boolean isDifferent(State s1,
                  State s2)
        Compare two images and populate the variance variable
        Parameters:
        s1 - State for image one.
        s2 - State for image two.
        Returns:
        True is the two images are different.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if s1 or s2 is NULL.

      • paintDifferences

        public void paintDifferences(int[] data)
        Given the int array of an image, paint the pixels that are different.
        Parameters:
        data - int array of an image.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if data int array is NULL.
